Package net.vz.mongodb.jackson.internal.stream

Class Summary
DBDecoderBsonParser Parser that wraps BSONParser to convert bson4jackson ObjectIds to org.bson ObjectIds, and stores error codes
DBEncoderBsonGenerator BsonGenerator that adds a bit of functionality specific to DBEncoding to the bson4jackson DBEncoder
JacksonDBDecoder<T> DB decoder that decodes the database stream using Jackson and bson4jackson
JacksonDBEncoder DBEncoder that uses bson4jackson if the object is a JacksonDBObject
JacksonDBObject<T> A Jackson DBObject.
JacksonDecoderFactory<T> DBDecoder factory for jackson
JacksonEncoderFactory Encoder factory for Jackson encoders
ObjectIdConvertor Converts bson4jackson ObjectIds to bson ObjectIds
OutputBufferOutputStream OutputStream that writes to a MongoDB OutputBuffer
ServerErrorProblemHandler Problem handler for handling server error properties
